DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluated the efficacy and tolerability of methyl aminolevulinate and 5-aminolevulinic acid photodynamic therapy in patients with moderate to severe facial acne vulgaris in a randomized controlled and investigator blinded trial.
DOC.brief_title: Photodynamic Therapy of Acne Vulgaris - a Randomized Blinded Controlled Study
DOC.criteria: 18 years or older, good health, more than 12 inflammatory facial acne lesions skin type VI, pregnant or lactating woman. Oral retinoid use within one year, systemic antibiotics within 1 month, topical acne treatment within 2 weeks.
